items.description: Tracks the provisioning state of SCIM resources to external targets.

external_id.description: The externalId attribute sent to/from the SCIM target.

external_resource_id.description: The resource identifier on the external system.

internal_resource_id.description: The internal resource identifier in our system.

last_error.description: Last error message if provisioning failed.

last_synced_at.description: When the resource was last successfully synced.

next_retry_at.description: When the next retry should be attempted.

target_id.description: The SCIM target (endpoint) this resource is provisioned to.

tenant_id.description: The tenant this state belongs to.

updated_at.description: When this record was last updated.

items.title: ScimProvisioningState
